div.head: 金刃箭鏃傷
div.div: injury inflicted by metal [objects such as] blade and arrowhead

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: injury inflicted by metal [objects such as] blade and arrowhead

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with dao jian shang 刀箭傷 , harm inflicted by blade and arrow. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry hua ru shi 花乳石 quoting Tai ping hui min he ji Recipe book. Northern Song, ju fang 1107~1110. 太平惠民和劑局方 8: 花蕊石散，治一切金刃箭鏃傷 中及打撲傷損 , “The powder with hua rui shi cures all types of injury inflicted by metal [objects, such as] blade and being struck by an arrowhead as well as injuries from blows and falls”.
